content: > free version is available on the blog click on the link above crochet tiger blanket pattern snuggle up in a comfy and cozy little tiger blanket perfect for baby showers or for a new addition to the family the blanket is made by using the classic granny stitch which will never be out of date and the blanket can be loved for years to come in this blanket we use granny stitch which makes it perfect for busting a bit of your stash as you can use all your small leftover balls and still have a stunning blanket you can also combine this blanket with the rest of our animal square blankets and create your own or simply purchase the combined pdf patterns the pattern is written in us crochet terminology materials - worsted weight/ aran weight yarn - 5 and 6mm crochet hook - tapestry needle if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact us
